IELTS Review
总结一些雅思复习的要点
(93 封私信 / 99+ 条消息) 如何把雅思写作水平提高到 8.0 以上？ - 知乎
雅思写作Task 2（大作文）全攻略解析 - 知乎
Task 1 (Short Essay)
Line Graph
以下是描述折线图的一些有用短语：
Increased sharply/rise dramatically
Fell steadily/drop consistently/decrease marginally
Fluctuate/experience fluctuation
Remain stable/stay consistent
Peak/reach the highest point
Reach the lowest level/hit a low of
For example:
The price of textbooks fell sharply in 2019.
There was a rapid decrease in the price of textbooks in 2019.
The year 2019 witnessed a dramatic drop in the price of textbooks.
A sharp fall in the price of textbooks took place in 2019.
The price of textbooks showed a downward trend in 2019.
描述折线图时，可以使用连接短语，例如：
Starting at X, Y fluctuated around this level in the first decade
Y had fluctuated around X for the first decade before it dropped abruptly in Z
However, the Zs witnessed a considerable rise and reached a peak at X in Y
A peak of X took place in Y, followed by a dramatic fall over the next ten-year period
Yet, there had been a stable pattern (maintained a low value) at X until Y, when it started to gain steadily for a relatively long time.
Nonetheless
For example:
Starting at 30, X fluctuated around this level in the first decade
X had fluctuated around 30 for the first decade before it dropped abruptly in 1970
However, the 1970s witnessed a considerable rise and reached a peak at 60 in 1980
A peak of 60 took place at 1980, followed by a dramatic fall over the next ten-year period
Yet, there had been a stable pattern (maintained a low value) at 8 until 2000, when it started to gain steadily for a relatively long time.
Nonetheless
Bar Chart
Pie Chart
Table
Diagram
Map
Mixed Charts
Task 2 (Long Essay)
